title: Well Maintained Coconut Estate Facing Main Road For Sale
details:
This is a well maintained Coconut Estate located only 5Km away from the Puttalam Town.
This Estate has a very good harvest of around 22,500 nuts every 2 months if there is no drought.During the drought the harvest comes down to 6,000 Nuts.Apart from the Coconut plantation the Estate has 200 Trees of Orange & 60 Trees of Mango.
The Estate has 1,700 Coconut Trees bearing fruit and 1,350 Trees only 3 Years old and bear fruit in another 2 years time.

Owner migrating and that is the main reason for selling.

Selling Price :- 110 Million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
